title: JLPT-Kanji Quiz
summary:
If you who always search and learn a quiz app like these, this app is for you

1. JLPT Flash card app.
2. JLPT Quiz app.
3. JLPT Minna nihongo app.
4. JLPT N3, N4, N5.
5. JLPT Question app.
6. Guess the Kanji app.

Main Features:
・Breaking up the content of the JLPT: makes practice more interesting and less boring.
・Flashcard for JLPT N3, N4, N5
・Learn by Quiz JLPT N3, N4, N5

title: Flashcard Japanese beginner
summary:
Flashcards is an easy to use flashcard app which you can use to start study Japanese

Features:

• Several flashcard themes to choose from (animals, tree, fruits, etc.)
• Divide cards into categories
• Include pictures and sounds.
• Easy navigation - swipe or tap to next/back
• Very easy to get started
• Great support! I promptly respond to any questions or feedback you may have. Use my website's public forum or email me.

title: Easy Korean - Flashcard Quiz
summary:
Korean for beginner with many categories

If you who always search and learn a quiz app like these, this app is for you

1. Korean Flash card app.
2. Korean Quiz app.
3. Easy Korean Learning app.
4. Learn Korean.
5. Korean Question app.
6. Guess the Korean Word app.

Main Features:
・Breaking up the content of the category: makes practice more interesting and less boring.
・Flashcard for all vocabulary
・Learn by Quiz all daily words
